title: Average ticket price Boston Celtics ( NBA ) games 2015/16
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, containing a total of 10 data points.
Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is gradually increasing from 2006/07 to 2008/09, roughly constant from 2008/09 to 2011/12, slightly increasing from 2011/12 to 2012/13, roughly constant from 2012/13 to 2013/14, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2013/14 to 2015/16.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2006/07 and 2007/08.
The highest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 72.96 was reached at Year 2012/13
The lowest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 57.04 was reported at Year 2006/07
